lfdocs-conf v0.2.3 Release Notes
================================

Thanks to everyone who contributed to this release.

Notable changes since v0.2.2
----------------------------

lfdocs links now use https:// rather than http://

Full Change Log
---------------

da42118 Thanh Ha        Remove echo of docs path
7544e9e Thanh Ha        Add "skipsdist = true" to tox.ini
4b31e9a Thanh Ha        Add pre-commit hook for trailing-whitespace
36a5aca Thanh Ha        Update lfdocs links to https
